properties.command: bash -lc 'cd=$(pwd -P); if git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then root=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel); rel=${cd#$root}; if [ -z "$rel" ]; then basename "$root"; else printf "%s%s" "$(basename "$root")" "$rel"; fi; else if [ "$cd" = "$HOME" ]; then echo "~"; elif [[ "$cd" == "$HOME"/* ]]; then echo "~${cd#$HOME}"; else basename "$cd"; fi; fi'

bash -c 'chars=("" "󱎖" "󰮔" "" "󰠠" "󱤅" "󰎆" "󰛿" "󱠇" "󱠆"); idxfile="${HOME}/.oh-my-posh-char-idx"; idx=$(cat "$idxfile" 2>/dev/null || echo 0); idx=$((idx + 1)); idx=$((idx % ${#chars[@]})); echo $idx > "$idxfile"; printf "<#c0c0c0>${chars[$idx]}</>"'
